text: Artur Avila Cordeiro de Melo (born 29 June 1979) is a Brazilian mathematician naturalized French. He works on dynamical systems and spectral theory. He is one of the winners of the 2014 Fields Medal, being the first Latin American and lusophone to win such an award. == References == Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Scientists from Rio de Janeiro Category:Fields Medalists Category:Mathematicians
title: Artur Avila
